title: Drawing, "Design for a fountain: Neptune (after a chiaroscuro woodcut)", 1685–1735
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink, on paper.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Figure of Neptune or Poseidon after a woodcut by Hendrik Goltzius. Neptune, holding a paddle, is seen astride a dolphin, which he guides with reins. Signed, lower center: "Nicol[as] Bailly".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a fountain: Neptune (after a chiaroscuro woodcut)", 1685–1735.
1685–1735. Brush and wash, pen and ink, on paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-385.
